summary: Now you have Doge as your pet
descriptionHtml:
Description:
-------------------

Doge! Now you can have him as your pet. He's alone and in need of a friend. Go find him in the Alchemist's Shack.

!DAWNGUARD IS REQUIRED!

Doge is lazy, but powerful. He can take out a wolf without any problems, but he won't carry things for you (you can't trade with him).

[youtube]9eF-hnBXuaY[/youtube]

IMPORTANT TOO:

After you've opened Skyrim with the mod activated, save the game and exit it, then go play with the save you've made. -IF YOU DON'T DO THIS, THE DIALOGUE WON'T WORK (at first).
---------------------

INCOMPABILITY AND BUGS:

!!!NONE!!!
----------------------

Credits:

Grohiik/David Aron
Bethesda
----------------------

You can use any of the contents of this mod for whatever you like. Just leave a comment saying that you'll use it.
author: Grohiik
